lexa.core.expression

Class Compare

  • java.lang.Object
    • lexa.core.expression.Expression
      • lexa.core.expression.MultipleExpression
        • lexa.core.expression.Compare

  • class Compare
extends MultipleExpression
    Compare the results of two Expression evaluations.

    Both expressions must return results of the same type and the class must implement Comparable.

    If either results is null, the return will be null, otherwise it will be true or false depending on the result.

    If the first expression returns null, then the second is not evaluated.

    Since:
    2013-03
    Author:
    William
